name: Houdini Daybreaker Full Zip - Women's
description:
For exploring in questionable weather. The versatile Daybreaker is light and weather-resistant. Stretch fabric provides unrestricted range of motion and withstands abuse on the trail. It also uses a fluorocarbon-free DWR finish, and is completely recyclable, so you can feel good about your addition to the planet while you explore it.Prime Ripstop™ recycled polyester balances breathability and wind protection.Packs down small and is extremely quick to dry.DWR finish sheds light rain, dirt and grime.High collar helps cut chill winds.Gusseted sleeves provide a comfortable range of movement.Adjustable bottom hem seal out drafts.2 zippered front pockets.Houdini believes in a circular product life cycle, recycling and using recycled materials, with the goal of future proofing their supply chain.Regular fit wears just like you hoped it would.

        Sustainability
